about_the_game:
Contains in-game theme background music, scene background music, boss background music, and the format is MP3 and MAV.
As the content of the game increases, the music content of this DLC will gradually increase, and the subsequent ones will be added for free!
detailed_description:
Contains in-game theme background music, scene background music, boss background music, and the format is MP3 and MAV.
As the content of the game increases, the music content of this DLC will gradually increase, and the subsequent ones will be added for free!

subs.option_text: 边境猎人: 艾尔莎的命运之轮 Soundtrack - $2.99 $1.49

Minimum:

  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 2000 MB available space

short_description: After the empire invented the airship, people finally became able to fly across float continents and islands.Erza leads an exploration team to explore the savage frontier where the empire can’t reach. When they break through all difficulties and reaches the destination, what awaits them is...
